items.sentence: On Monday, Tom made it plain that he wasn't yet ready to throw in the towel.
We'd better go to another room, so they can't hear what we're talking about.
There was hardly anyone who didn't laugh when the singer fell off the stage.
When I was cleaning the attic, I found some old pictures of my grandparents.
Mary made a batch of cupcakes for the party, and they were eaten in no time.
Mary was a quiet type who kept to herself and rarely interacted with others.
Tom ended up asking Mary to the dance, even though he said that he wouldn't.
She couldn't have expected that he would come home when everything was over.
In the last three years, a lot of new buildings have been built around here.
Tom found out that the man he thought was his father wasn't his real father.
